item.description:
http://www.jimmiesofsavinrock.com/jimmies/Menu.aspx

Seafood Restaurant Specializing in Fresh Fish & Prime Rib

Satisfy your appetite with huge portions you’ll only find at Jimmies Galley. Our family-owned-and-operated seafood restaurant is a West Haven institution known for its fresh seafood and huge prime rib cuts that are beyond belief. In fact, the portions at our West Haven restaurant are so big, no one leaves without a carryout bag. Visit our restaurant and tiki bar in West Haven, Connecticut, for delicious seafood and sizzling prime rib. We’re conveniently located in West Haven.......A great place to have seafood or other delights.....walk on the magnificent boardwalk after......note: early time of 5pm....gets so busy....able to take a nice walk after on boardwalk.....
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles125@att.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: KING OF SEAFOOD JIMMIES OF SAVIN ROCK SAT JUNE 30 5PM
